welcome_message_body: Welcome to Brooklyn Park, where the charm of small-town America meets the excitement of a bustling city. Explore our beautiful parks, vibrant community, and rich cultural heritage as you immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and provides a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo operations and is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities for efficient handling and storage.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Anoka County–Blaine Airport offers a variety of services for travelers, including baggage claim, ticketing, and dining options.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Anoka County–Blaine Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft, providing amenities such as fueling, hangar space, and pilot services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Flying Cloud Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Flying Cloud Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Minneapolis - St. Paul International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Minneapolis - St. Paul International Airport, mainly serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Downtown Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Downtown Airport caters to VIP and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
